sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>

    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('clmCtrlFormulaSelect.clmCtrlFormulaSelect')" @backTo="back"/>

    <el-form ref="productBnftForm" :model="params" label-width="130px">
      <el-row :gutter="10">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('pdDiscountFormulaSelect.productDetailsType')">
            <cus-select v-model="params.eq_productDetailType" :codetype="'ProductCategory'"
                        @change="productDetailTypeChanged"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.appointedProduct')">
            <el-select v-model="params.eq_pdInfoId" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable
                       filterable @change="findAllClmCtrl">
              <el-option v-for="product in productOptionList" :key="product.id"
                         :label="product.pdCode + ':' + product.pdName" :value="product.id"></el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item
            :label="pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType==='O'||pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType==='MO'?$t('clmCtrlFormulaSelect.appointOb'):(pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType==='D'||pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType==='MD'?$t('clmCtrlFormulaSelect.appointDu'):$t('clmCtrlFormulaSelect.appointLimit'))">
            <el-select v-model="params.eq_pdBussId" :placeholder="$t('pdtempPdBnft.pleaseChoose')" clearable filterable>
              <el-option v-for="item in clmCtrlOptions" :key="item.id" :label="item.pdBnftCtrlCode"
                         :value="item.id"></el-option>
            </el-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
      <el-row :gutter="10">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('rule.pdBussDetailType')">
            <cus-select v-model="params.pdBussDetailType" :codetype="'ruleBusinessDetailClass'"
                        disabled filter="1$22$23$24$63$64$65$51$52$53"></cus-select>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('i18nView.formulaCode')">
            <el-input v-model="params.like_pdCalcCode" clearable></el-input>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item style="text-align: right">
            <el-button icon="el-icon-search" size="small" type="primary" @click="handleSearch">
              {{ $t('table.search') }}
            </el-button>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('i18nView.calcFormula')"/>
    <el-table :data="tableData_formula" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.id')" align="center" width="50">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ initTableIndex('page', scope.$index) }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.detail')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :filter-method="filters_method" :filters="filters_pdCode" :label="$t('customComponents.product')"
                       align="center"
                       min-width="200" prop="pdCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdCode ? scope.row.pdCode + ':' + scope.row.pdName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeItem')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBnftCode" sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftCode ? scope.row.pdBnftCode + ':' + scope.row.pdBnftName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.guaranteeDetails')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBnftDTCode"
                       sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftDTCode ? scope.row.pdBnftDTCode + ':' + scope.row.pdBnftDTName : '' }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.payControlType')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBnftCtrlType"
                       sortable>
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBnftCtrlType | filter_clmCtrlType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('i18nView.formulaDet')" align="center" min-width="200" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcCode')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.pdCalcDesc')" align="center" min-width="200"
                       prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')" align="center" min-width="200">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{
            scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '')
          }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" fixed="right" width="120">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <el-button v-auth="'clmCtrlFormulaSelect:associate'" icon="el-icon-connection"
                     size="mini" type="primary" @click="handleSelectFormula(scope.row)">
            {{ $t('form.select') }}
          </el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="tableData_formula" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="5"
                    :params="params" url="/clmCtrlFormulaSelect/base/allFormulaToAssociate"/>

    <!-- 公式查看弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :performType="formulaView.performType" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode"
                     :ruleModifyClosed="ruleMakeClosed" :ruleType="'2'"
                     :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>

  </cus-wraper>
</template>

<script>
import {
  associate,
  findAllClmCtrl,
  findAllMedClmCtrl,
  findAllProductByDetailType
} from "@/api/basicinfo/clmCtrlFormulaSelect"

let _this

export default {
  name: 'clmCtrlFormulaSelect',
  props: {
    pdtempClmCtrlMain: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    },
    pdBussDetailType: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    pdtempPdBnft: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    },
    pdtempPdClmBnft: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      params: {
        product: undefined,
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType,
        current_pdBussId: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id,
        eq_productDetailType: '',
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        eq_pdBussId: undefined,
        like_pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        performType: '',
        visible: false
      },
      productType: {
        type: '',
        detailType: ''
      },
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        bType: '',
        cType: '',
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      filters_pdCode: [],
      tableData_formula: [],
      productOptionList: [],//产品数组
      clmCtrlOptions: []//赔付控制项数组
    }
  },
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    },
    filter_clmCtrlType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('clmCtrlType', code)
    }
  },
  watch: {
    tableData_formula() {
      this.filters_pdCode = []
      this.tableData_formula.forEach(val => {
        if (!this._.includes(this._.map(this.filters_pdCode, 'value'), val.pdCode)) {
          this.filters_pdCode.push({
            text: val.pdCode + ':' + val.pdName,
            value: val.pdCode
          })
        }
      })
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.initProductInfo()
  },
  methods: {
    productDetailTypeChanged(val) {
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = undefined
      this.productOptionList = []
      findAllProductByDetailType(this.buildRequestData({productDetailType: val})).then(response => {
        this.productOptionList = response.data
      })
    },
    findAllClmCtrl(pdInfoId) {
      this.clmCtrlOptions = []
      this.params.pdBnftCtrlCode = ''
      if (!pdInfoId) {
        return
      }
      if (this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType.startsWith('M')) {
        const param = {
          pdInfoId: pdInfoId,
          pdBnftCtrlType: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType
        }
        findAllMedClmCtrl(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
          this.clmCtrlOptions = response.data
        })
      } else {
        const param = {
          pdInfoId: pdInfoId,
          bnftCode: this.pdtempPdClmBnft.id ? this.pdtempPdClmBnft.pdClmBnftCode : this.pdtempPdBnft.pdBnftCode,
          pdBnftCtrlType: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlType
        }
        findAllClmCtrl(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
          this.clmCtrlOptions = response.data
        })
      }
    },
    ruleMakeClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_ClmCtrlFormulaSelect', false)
    },
    initProductInfo() {
      const pdtempPdInfo = this.getPdData()
      if (Object.keys(pdtempPdInfo).length > 0) {
        Object.assign(this.product, pdtempPdInfo)
        this.params.product = this.product
        this.productType.detailType = this.product.cType
        this.productType.type = this.product.bType
        this.params.eq_productDetailType = this.product.cType
        this.productDetailTypeChanged(this.productType.detailType)
      } else {
        this.notifyError(this.$t('message.invalidProductInfo'))
      }
    },
    showFormula(row) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = row.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.performType = row.performType
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    handleSearch() {
      this.$refs.page.reload()
    },
    handleSelectFormula(row) {
      let PdtempPdCalc = {
        pdInfoId: this.product.id,
        pdVerId: this.product.pdVerId,
        pdType: '',
        pdCode: this.product.pdCode,
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType,
        pdBussId: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id,
        pdBussCode: this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.pdBnftCtrlCode,
        pdStructureType: this.pdtempPdClmBnft.id ? '12' : '18',
        pdCalcCode: row.pdCalcCode,
        pdCalcDesc: row.pdCalcDesc
      }
      const param = {
        selectedFormula: row,
        pdtempPdCalc: PdtempPdCalc,
        product: this.product,
        pdBussType: '2',
        pdBussDetailType: this.pdBussDetailType,
        needChecking: true
      }
      associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
        let successFlag = response.data.flag
        let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
        if (successFlag === true) {
          this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
          this.$refs.page.reload()
          this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
        } else {
          this.$confirm(String(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.confirm_overwrite_formula')), String(this.$t('confirmMessage.tip')), {
            confirmButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.confirm')),
            cancelButtonText: String(this.$t('confirmMessage.cancel')),
            type: 'warning'
          }).then(() => {
            param.needChecking = false
            associate(this.buildRequestData(param)).then(response => {
              let pdtempPdCalc = response.data.pdtempPdCalc
              this.notifySuccess(this.$t('rule.associationSuccess'))
              this.$refs.page.reload()
              this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', this.pdtempClmCtrlMain.id, pdtempPdCalc.pdCalcCode)
            })
          }).catch(() => {
            this.messageInfo(this.$t('underwritingAmountFormulaSelect.canceled'))
          })
        }
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

</style>
